settings@displayCounter.description: Display number of links linkified as icon badge

settings@useRegularExpressions.description: Use regular expressions for domains filtering

settings@domainFilteringMode@whitelist.message: Подчёркивать только домены в белом списке

settings@domainFilteringMode@blacklist.message: Никогда не подчёркивать домены в чёрном списке

settings@domainFilteringMode@domainList@.description: List of domains for filtering (white or black)

settings@overrideTextColor.description: To change text color of hyperlinks

settings@overrideBackgroundColor.description: To change background color of hyperlinks

settings@syncSettings.description: To active multi devices synchronization of settings

settings@resetDefaults.description: Reset all settings to default values

settings@resetDefaults@confirm@content.message: Вы уверены, что хотите сбросить настройки по умолчанию?
settings@resetDefaults@confirm@content.description:
You are about to reset settings to default values.
Are you sure you want to continue?

advancedSettings@links@predefinedRules@U.message: Подчёркивать URL, содержащие единую часть (например, host:port)
advancedSettings@links@predefinedRules@U.description: Linkify URL containing the alone authority (i.e. host:port)

advancedSettings@links@extraFeatures@aut.message: Отключить обработку динамических изменений, если она занимает больше, чем:
advancedSettings@links@extraFeatures@aut.description: Disable the processing of dynamic changes if it takes longer than:

advancedSettings@customRules@ruleEditor@.message: Шаблон не является допустимым регулярным выражением
advancedSettings@customRules@ruleEditor@.description: Pattern is not a valid regular expression

advancedSettings@customRules@ruleEditor@.message: URL-адрес не является допустимым регулярным выражением
advancedSettings@customRules@ruleEditor@.description: URL is not a valid regular expression

panel@include.desription: Add current tab URL as supported url

panel@exclude.desription: Exclude current tab URL as spported url

releaseNotes@localization.message: Система локализации уже полностью функционирует. Любая помощь приветствуется... Отправьте мне по электронной почте запрос на предоставление локализуемых материалов.

releaseNotes@more_information.message: Пожалуйста, посетите страницу дополнения для получения дополнительной информации.

releaseNotes@new_features@3_2_0@1.message: Теперь можно управлять генерацией поля заголовка 'HTTP referrer'. По умолчанию оно не генерируется.
releaseNotes@new_features@3_2_0@1.description: The generation of the 'HTTP referrer' header field can now be controlled. By default, it is not generated.

releaseNotes@enhancements@3_2_0@1.description: Top level domains list is updated.

releaseNotes@enhancements@3_1_1@1.message: Исправлена ​​регрессия в навигации Firefox, появившаяся в версии 3.1.0.
releaseNotes@enhancements@3_1_1@1.description: Fixes a regression, regarding text/plain documents, introduced in version 3.1.0.

releaseNotes@new_features@3_1_0@1.message: Linkificator теперь полностью основан на WebExtension API и поэтому совместим с Firefox 57+.
releaseNotes@new_features@3_1_0@1.description: Linkificator is now fully based on WebExtension API and so is compatible with Firefox 57+.

releaseNotes@new_features@3_0_0@1.message:
Linkificator теперь основан на WebExtension API и поэтому полностью совместим с Firefox 57+.
Примечание: Текущая версия является гибридной (т.е. отображается как УСТАРЕВШЕЕ в Firefox), чтобы иметь возможность применить текущие настройки в новой среде. Следующая версия будет полноценным WebExtension дополнением.
releaseNotes@new_features@3_0_0@1.description: Linkificator is now based on WebExtension API and so is fully compatible with Firefox 57+.

releaseNotes@limitations@3_0_0@1.message: Из-за различных ограничений, связанных с переходом на WebExtension API, следующие функции больше недоступны:
releaseNotes@limitations@3_0_0@1.description: Due to various limitations and restrictions imposed by the WebExtension API, the following features are no longer available:

releaseNotes@limitations@3_0_0@1_5.message: Но я надеюсь, что некоторые ограничения будут сняты в будущем с развитием WebExtension API
releaseNotes@limitations@3_0_0@1_5.description: But I hope that some limitations will be suppressed in the future with the evolution of WebExtension API.

releaseNotes@limitations@3_0_0@2.message: В настоящее время пользовательские правила больше не редактируются, но это ограничение будет снято в будущей версии.
releaseNotes@limitations@3_0_0@2.description: Currently, custom rules are no longer editable but this limitation will be suppressed in a future version.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_3_2@1.message: Исправлена ​​регрессия в навигации Firefox, появившаяся в версии 2.3.1.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_3_2@1.desription: Fixes a regression, regarding text/plain documents, introduced in version 2.3.1.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_3_1@2.description: Top level domains list is updated.

releaseNotes@limitations@2_3_1@1.description: Drop support for Firefox versions before 38.0.

releaseNotes@new_features@2_3_0@1.message: Для минимального потребления ресурсов теперь можно обрабатывать документы только по запросу.
releaseNotes@new_features@2_3_0@1.description: For a minimal resources consumption, it is now possible to process the documents only on demand.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_3_0@2.message: Реорганизован и обновлён список доменов верхнего уровня.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_3_0@2.description: Top level domains list reorganized and updated.

releaseNotes@limitations@2_3_0@1.description: Drop support for Firefox versions before 31.0.

releaseNotes@new_features@2_2_0@1.message: Теперь можно сохранять и восстанавливать настройки Linkificator, а также сбрасывать их по умолчанию (см. 'Управление настройками' в опциях дополнения).
releaseNotes@new_features@2_2_0@1.description: It is now possible to save and restore Linkificator settings as well as restoring defaults (see 'Settings management' in add-on Options).

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_4@1.message: Исправлена ​​регрессия в отношении обычных и текстовых документов, появившаяся в версии 2.1.1.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_4@1.description: Fixes a regression, regarding plain/text documents, introduced in version 2.1.1.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_3@1.message: Исправлена ​​регрессия в отношении обычных и текстовых документов, появившаяся в версии 2.1.1.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_3@1.description: Fixes a regression, regarding plain/text documents, introduced in version 2.1.1.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_3@2.message: Улучшено восстановление первоначального содержимого страниц, когда дополнение отключено или удалено в Firefox 30.0 и выше.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_3@2.description: Enhances, for Firefox 30.0 and newer, the restoration of the original content of pages when add-on is disabled or removed.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_2@1.message: Исправлена ​​регрессия в навигации Firefox, появившаяся в версии 2.1.1.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_2@1.description: Fixes a regression, regarding Firefox navigation, introduced in version 2.1.1.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_1@1.message: Улучшен интерфейс для управления чёрным/белым списками.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_1@1.description: Enhances UI for black/white lists management.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_1@2.message: Существенно уменьшено потребление ресурсов для обработки некоторых страниц.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_1@2.description: Reduces, dramatically for some pages, resources consumption for processing.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_1@3.message: Оптимизировано восстановление исходного содержания страниц, когда дополнение отключено или удалено, для Firefox 30.0 и выше, предотвращает перезагрузку страниц.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_1@3.description: Optimizes the restoration of the original content of pages when add-on is disabled or removed and, for Firefox 30.0 and newer, avoids to reload pages.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_1_1@4.description: Top level domains list is updated.

releaseNotes@new_features@2_1_0@1.message: Автоматическое поведение линкификации теперь можно настроить на свой вкус (см. Дополнительные параметры, вкладка ссылок).
releaseNotes@new_features@2_1_0@1.description: Automatic linkification behavior can now be adjusted to your taste (see Advanced Settings, Links tab).

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_6@1.message: Исправлена регрессия при парсинге частей URI домена.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_6@1.description: Fixes regression on URI domain part parsing.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_5@3.description: Top level domains list is updated.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_3@1.message: Обработка обновления содержимого страниц для поддержки Firefox 32.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_3@1.description: Updates page content processing for Firefox 32 support.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_3@2.description: Top level domains list is updated.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_2@2.description: Adds support of namespaces in documents.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_2@4.message: Различные исправления ошибок во встроенных элементах обработки.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_2@4.description: Various bugs fixes on inline elements handling.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_2@5.description: Top level domains list is updated.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_1@1.message: Обновлён список доменов верхнего уровня и улучшено его управление.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_1@1.description: Top level domains list is updated and its management is enhanced.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_1@2.message: Пункты в контекстном меню виджета теперь показывают комбинацию клавиш, если таковая имеется.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_1@2.description: Entries in widget contextual menu show now the keyboard shortcut, if any.

releaseNotes@new_features@2_0_0@1.message:
Support of the new Firefox UI (Australis). The Linkificator's widget behavior is strictly identical to native widgets on Australis UI.
The new behavior of widgets requires to change the configuration options of the mouse: It is no longer possible to configure the left boution mouse because it is reserved for displaying the context menu.
releaseNotes@new_features@2_0_0@1.description:
Support of the new Firefox UI (Australis). The Linkificator's widget behavior is strictly identical to native widgets on Australis UI.
The new behavior of widgets requires to change the configuration options of the mouse: It is no longer possible to configure the left boution mouse because it is reserved for displaying the context menu.

releaseNotes@new_features@2_0_0@2.message:
It is now possible to linkify an ignored page (blacklisted or not whitelisted). For that purpose, action 'Include' can be used (keyboard shortcut or widget context menu entry).
NOTA: 'Include' action concerns only the current URL. Default filtering rules will be applied as soon as the page changes.
releaseNotes@new_features@2_0_0@2.description:
It is now possible to linkify an ignored page (blacklisted or not whitelisted). For that purpose, action 'Include' can be used (keyboard shortcut or widget context menu entry).
NOTA: 'Include' action concerns only the current URL. Default filtering rules will be applied as soon as the page changes.

releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_0@1.message: Enhances widget behavior in multi-windows mode.
releaseNotes@enhancements@2_0_0@1.description: Enhances widget behavior in multi-windows mode.

releaseNotes@limitations@2_0_0@1.message: During upgrade to this major new version from a previous one (1.*), mouse buttons customization will be lost.
releaseNotes@limitations@2_0_0@1.description: During upgrade to this major new version from a previous one (1.*), mouse buttons customization will be lost.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_6_3@1.message: Enhances widget handling in multi-windows mode.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_6_3@1.description: Enhances widget handling in multi-windows mode.

releaseNotes@limitations@1_6_3@1.message: Due to new add-on packaging, minimal version supported is now Firefox 21.
releaseNotes@limitations@1_6_3@1.description: Due to new add-on packaging, minimal version supported is now Firefox 21.

releaseNotes@limitations@1_6_2@1.message: Due to new add-on packaging, minimal version supported is now Firefox 21.
releaseNotes@limitations@1_6_2@1.description: Due to new add-on packaging, minimal version supported is now Firefox 21.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_6_1@1.message: It is now possible to deactivate automatic processing of dynamic changes (see 'Advanced settings', 'Links' tab).
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_6_1@1.description: It is now possible to deactivate automatic processing of dynamic changes (see 'Advanced settings', 'Links' tab).

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_6_1@2.message: Optimizes automatic processing to avoid potential lags.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_6_1@2.description: Optimizes automatic processing to avoid potential lags.

releaseNotes@limitations@1_6_1@1.message: Due to new add-on packaging, minimal version supported is now Firefox 21.
releaseNotes@limitations@1_6_1@1.description: Due to new add-on packaging, minimal version supported is now Firefox 21.

releaseNotes@new_features@1_6_0@1.message: The dynamic changes of current page are now detected and automatically processed.
releaseNotes@new_features@1_6_0@1.description: The dynamic changes of current page are now detected and automatically processed.

releaseNotes@limitations@1_6_0@1.message: Due to new add-on packaging, minimal version supported is now Firefox 21.
releaseNotes@limitations@1_6_0@1.description: Due to new add-on packaging, minimal version supported is now Firefox 21.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_5_3@1.message: Fix erroneous handling of inline elements.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_5_3@1.description: Fix erroneous handling of inline elements.

releaseNotes@limitations@1_5_3@1.message:
Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.
releaseNotes@limitations@1_5_3@1.description:
Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_5_2@1.message:
By default, to reduce even more the false positives, the URLs containing only the authority (i.e. host:port) are no longer linkified, even if they contain a valid top level domain.
The option 'Advanced Options->Links->Linkify URL containing the alone authority' enables to activate this treatment.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_5_2@1.description:
By default, to reduce even more the false positives, the URLs containing only the authority (i.e. host:port) are no longer linkified, even if they contain a valid top level domain.
The option 'Advanced Options->Links->Linkify URL containing the alone authority' enables to activate this treatment.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_5_2@3.message: Speed-up processing when Top Level Domains are used.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_5_2@3.description: Speed-up processing when Top Level Domains are used.

releaseNotes@limitations@1_5_2@1.message:
Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.
releaseNotes@limitations@1_5_2@1.description:
Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_5_1@1.message: Enhances identification of start of URIs.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_5_1@1.description: Enhances identification of start of URIs.

releaseNotes@limitations@1_5_1@1.message:
Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.
releaseNotes@limitations@1_5_1@1.description:
Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.

releaseNotes@new_features@1_5_0@1.message:
To reduce false positives, URI are now recognized only if the domain part is terminated with a known top level domain.
It is possible to de-activate this mode (and so, reverting to the behavior of the previous version) through 'Advanced settings', tab 'Links'.
releaseNotes@new_features@1_5_0@1.description:
To reduce false positives, URI are now recognized only if the domain part is terminated with a known top level domain.
It is possible to de-activate this mode (and so, reverting to the behavior of the previous version) through 'Advanced settings', tab 'Links'.

releaseNotes@limitations@1_5_0@1.message:
Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.
releaseNotes@limitations@1_5_0@1.description:

So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_4_2@1.message: Speeds up the processing of inline tags to reduce drastically the potential freezes of Firefox.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_4_2@1.description: Speeds up the processing of inline tags to reduce drastically the potential freezes of Firefox.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_4_2@2.message: For a better compatibility with 'Pale Moon' browser, changes slightly the checking of version of Firefox to disable the panel on version 20.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_4_2@2.description: For a better compatibility with 'Pale Moon' browser, changes slightly the checking of version of Firefox to disable the panel on version 20.

releaseNotes@limitations@1_4_2@1.message:
Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.

Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_4_1@1.message: Enhance page history navigation handling (Back/Forward buttons).
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_4_1@1.description: Enhance page history navigation handling (Back/Forward buttons).

releaseNotes@limitations@1_4_1@1.message:
Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.
releaseNotes@limitations@1_4_1@1.description:
Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.

releaseNotes@new_features@1_4_0@1.message:
Left click is now configurable. As a result, menu can now be assigned to any mouse button.
By default, for compatibility purpose, menu display is binded to left click.
releaseNotes@new_features@1_4_0@1.description:
Left click is now configurable. As a result, menu can now be assigned to any mouse button.
By default, for compatibility purpose, menu display is binded to left click.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_4_0@1.message: Per window private browsing mode is now fully supported but have some restrictions on Firefox 20 due to SDK limitations specifically on this version.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_4_0@1.description: Per window private browsing mode is now fully supported but have some restrictions on Firefox 20 due to SDK limitations specifically on this version.

releaseNotes@limitations@1_4_0@1.message:
Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.
releaseNotes@limitations@1_4_0@1.description:
Per window private browsing mode on Firefox 20 is not compatible with SDK panels feature. This feature is used by Linkificator for context menu.
So, on Firefox 20, Linkificator context menu is deactivated. It is strongly recommended to upgrade to Firefox 21 and above to have a fully operational Linkificator.

releaseNotes@new_features@1_3_0@1.message: Page context menu integration: it is possible to update links through page context menu (customizable).
releaseNotes@new_features@1_3_0@1.description: Page context menu integration: it is possible to update links through page context menu (customizable).

releaseNotes@new_features@1_3_0@2.message: Middle click on Widget is now configurable. No action is binded by default.
releaseNotes@new_features@1_3_0@2.description: Middle click on Widget is now configurable. No action is binded by default.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_3_0@1.message: Change behavior of disabled state : linkificator actions are now reverted when Linkificator is disabled.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_3_0@1.description: Change behavior of disabled state : linkificator actions are now reverted when Linkificator is disabled.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_3_0@2.message: Fix erroneous handling of status tooltip.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_3_0@2.description: Fix erroneous handling of status tooltip.

releaseNotes@limitations@1_3_0@1.message:
Per window private browsing mode (Firefox 20+) is not supported due to an Add-on SDK bug (see 816257).
The support will be added as soon as SDK bug is fixed (planned for SDK 1.15 version).
releaseNotes@limitations@1_3_0@1.description:
Per window private browsing mode (Firefox 20+) is not supported due to an Add-on SDK bug (see 816257).
The support will be added as soon as SDK bug is fixed (planned for SDK 1.15 version).

releaseNotes@new_features@1_2_0@1.message:
Possibility to toggle processing of the current page.
This action can be launched through widget menu (Exclude/Include) or the hot key control-shift-x (customizable).
releaseNotes@new_features@1_2_0@1.description:
Possibility to toggle processing of the current page.
This action can be launched through widget menu (Exclude/Include) or the hot key control-shift-x (customizable).

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_2_0@1.message: Enhance anchor handling when inline elements are involved.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_2_0@1.description: Enhance anchor handling when inline elements are involved.

releaseNotes@new_features@1_1_1@1.message:
Possibility to update the current page without reloading it.
This action can be launched by a right click on the Linkificator widget or through the hot key control-shift-u (customizable).
releaseNotes@new_features@1_1_1@1.description:
Possibility to update the current page without reloading it.
This action can be launched by a right click on the Linkificator widget or through the hot key control-shift-u (customizable).

releaseNotes@new_features@1_1_1@2.message: Left click on the widget now display a menu for an easy access to the most common operations as well as the options page.
releaseNotes@new_features@1_1_1@2.description: Left click on the widget now display a menu for an easy access to the most common operations as well as the options page.

releaseNotes@new_features@1_1_1@3.message: An action can be directly executed with a right click on the widget. This action is customizable (see Options).
releaseNotes@new_features@1_1_1@3.description: An action can be directly executed with a right click on the widget. This action is customizable (see Options).

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_1_1@1.message: Fix custom rule checkbox handling on Mac OS.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_1_1@1.description: Fix custom rule checkbox handling on Mac OS.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_0_3@1.message: Enable custom rules edition on Mac OS.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_0_3@1.description: Enable custom rules edition on Mac OS.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_0_2@2.message: Reduce resources consumption and potential UI freezes.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_0_2@2.description: Reduce resources consumption and potential UI freezes.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_0_1@1.message: Tag <span> is now handled has an inline element.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_0_1@1.description: Tag <span> is now handled has an inline element.

releaseNotes@new_features@1_0_0@1.message: Inline elements, like <big> or <strong>, are now recognized and correctly handled during URLs parsing.
releaseNotes@new_features@1_0_0@1.description: Inline elements, like <big> or <strong>, are now recognized and correctly handled during URLs parsing.

releaseNotes@new_features@1_0_0@2.message: Existing pages are now automatically parsed when add-on is installed or re-enabled. It is no longer required to manually reload the page.
releaseNotes@new_features@1_0_0@2.description: Existing pages are now automatically parsed when add-on is installed or re-enabled. It is no longer required to manually reload the page.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_0_0@1.message: Multi-frames documents are now correctly handled in all cases.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_0_0@1.description: Multi-frames documents are now correctly handled in all cases.

releaseNotes@enhancements@1_0_0@2.message: Plain text documents are now recognized and parsed.
releaseNotes@enhancements@1_0_0@2.description: Plain text documents are now recognized and parsed.
